methodref.name: FromString
methodref.description: Split attribute (taking parentheses and quotes into consideration).

methodref.name: Moveattribute
methodref.description: Move a block of attribute items.

methodref.name: Clone
methodref.description: Create a copy of an object instance.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.

page.original:
CSS::AttributeValueArray Class Properties Property Type Description attribute C Array of attributes
Methods Method Description PUBLIC Clone AS P ()Create a copy of an object instance. PUBLIC Deleteattribute AS L (as N AS Index)Delete a attribute. PUBLIC FromString AS v (definition AS C)Split attribute (taking parentheses and quotes into consideration). PUBLIC Insertattribute AS L (as c [ AS attribute ,InsertBefore as N = 1] AS )Insert a new attribute. PUBLIC Moveattribute AS L (as N AS MoveTo ,MoveFrom as N [ItemsToCopy as N = 1] AS )Move a block of attribute items. PUBLIC NewInstance AS P ()Create a new object instance of the same type. PUBLIC ToString AS c ()Combine attributes.
See Also CSS Namespace
